alert.note: Alert for Beckham; Ellis; Greer; Harmon; Harper; Jackson; Roger Mills (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued January 14 at 3:34AM CST until January 14 at 7:00PM CST by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...Dry and windy conditions expected late this afternoon through this evening... .A stout, upper level storm system will move down the Great Plains today and enter Oklahoma overnight. South winds are expected to increase ahead of a strong cold front early this afternoon across portions southwestern Oklahoma and portions of north Texas. Then, late this afternoon into early this evening, a rapid wind shift from the north will occur behind the cold front. Gusts as high as 50 mph will be possible near and just after sunset. ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 7 PM CST THIS EVENING FOR DRY AND WINDY CONDITIONS FOR WESTERN OKLAHOMA PORTIONS OF NORTH TEXAS... * TIMING...LATE THIS AFTERNOON THROUGH THIS EVENING. * WINDS...South 10 to 15 mph this afternoon, then north 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 50 mph late this afternoon through tonight. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 17 percent. * TEMPERATURES...Low 60s to mid 70s.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures will contribute to extreme fire behavior.
